problem.multiplechoiceresponse:
Examine the following scenario.
You take your car to Latkaâ€™s Total Car Care on three different occasions, and each time your car is fixed. You conclude that this time your car will again be fixed.
Does the addition of the item below strengthen the argument (S), weaken the argument (W), or leave the strength of the argument unchanged (U)? You have actually taken your car on eight different occassions and each time your car is fixed.
Strengthen the argument
Weaken the argument
Unchanged
